summary: The Riverwood Trader has now been Upgraded
descriptionHtml:
I have always liked the riverwood trader, but I found it kind of dark and does not have a great appearance, but I have now upgraded it and improved the furniture.

Added:

An extra shelving unit
Now there are rows for ingredients, potions, and things like, linen,pots, etc.
There now also weapon racks and shield racks on the walls and have laid some armor on display.

Under the stairs in now better looking and looks more organized, hope you like my mod.
author: Buddy1011
